name: Calculate ROL
query:
select
 `tabStock Ledger Entry`.posting_date as "Date:Date:100",
 `tabStock Ledger Entry`.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:150",
 `tabStock Ledger Entry`.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:100",
 `tabStock Ledger Entry`.actual_qty as "Qty:Float:70",
 `tabStock Ledger Entry`.qty_after_transaction as "Balance:Float:70",
 `tabStock Ledger Entry`.voucher_type as "Voucher Type::150",
 `tabStock Ledger Entry`.voucher_no as "Voucher No::150",
 `tabStock Ledger Entry`.name as "Name::100",
 `tabItem`.re_order_level as "ROL::70"
 
 from
`tabItem` left join `tabStock Ledger Entry` on (`tabItem`.name = `tabStock Ledger Entry`.item_code)

where
`tabStock Ledger Entry`.item_code != ""
and `tabStock Ledger Entry`.item_code = `tabItem`.name
and `tabStock Ledger Entry`.item_code REGEXP '^RH'

ORDER BY
`tabStock Ledger Entry`.item_code asc, `tabStock Ledger Entry`.name asc
